keyMappings:
map K scrollPageUp
map J scrollPageDown
map R reload hard
map g^ firstTab
map <a-h> firstTab
map <a-l> lastTab
map <C-j> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-k> scrollFullPageUp
map yl LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
# Search through your opened tabs
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map T createTab https://www.google.com/
# Open multiple links in new tabs
map gl LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
unmap >>
unmap <<
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
unmap d
map dd removeTab
map <C-r> restoreTab
map u goBack
map U goForward
" Open a Link in current tab using a new tab
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
searchEngines:
bai: https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%s Baidu
git: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
wiki: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
zh: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s 知乎
tb https://s.taobao.com/search?q=%s 淘宝
bz https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s b站
jd https://search.jd.com/Search?keyword=%s 京东
